introduction.paragraph: This request creates or updates a design document.

body.paragraph: This request does not have any required headers.
This request does not use query parameters.
The message body is a JSON document that one or more view definitions and some other fields.
This response uses only standard HTTP headers.
The response contains a JSON document that contains some of the following objects:

row.entry: Indicates whether the operation was successful

body.paragraph: The following example creates a design document with the ID _design/beer4 in a database named beer-db. The design document defines two views, brewery_beers and by_location. Both views define a map function, but only the by_location view defines a reduce function.
